Riley Horn


Hello! I'm a research scientist with a background in biomechanics and neuromotor control. As a biomechanist, I enjoy expanding my biomechanical toolbox through learning new data collection techniques and research software. I am currently interested in exploring research in wearable devices, biological signals, and biomechanical imaging. In my free time, I enjoy music, disc golf, and running.

This can be your internal website page / project page
